gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `PropertyPlantEquipment` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `PropertyPlantEquipment` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` SHOULD NOT be reported, because `PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_PropertyPlantEquipment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_PropertyPlantEquipment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `LandAndBuildingsForOwnUseMember` SHOULD be equal to `LandAndBuildingsForOwnUse` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and LandAndBuildingsForOwnUseMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` SHOULD be equal to `PropertyPlantEquipment` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and PropertyPlantEquipmentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `PropertyPlantEquipmentOtherMember` SHOULD be equal to `PropertyPlantEquipmentOther` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and PropertyPlantEquipmentOtherMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementBanks_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
